description: Enterprise techniques used by esentutl, ATT&CK software S0404 v1.0
name: esentutl (S0404)

techniques.comment: esentutl can use Volume Shadow Copy to copy locked files such as ntds.dit.[2][3]
esentutl can be used to read and write alternate data streams.[2]
esentutl can be used to copy files from a remote host or download files from a given URL.[2]
